text: KC and the Sunshine Band was a disco group, that was popular in the 1970s. They formed in Miami in 1973. Hits are "That's the Way (I Like It)", "(Shake, Shake, Shake) Shake Your Booty", "Give It Up", "Get Down Tonight", and "Please Don't Go". == Album discography == * Do It Good (1974) * KC and the Sunshine Band (1975) US #4, UK #26 * The Sound of Sunshine (1975) US #131 * Part 3 (1976) US #13 * Who Do Ya Love (1978) US #36 * Do You Wanna Go Party (1979) US #50 * Space Cadet (1981) * The Painter (1981) * All in a Night's Work (1982) * KC Ten (1983) US #93 * Oh Yeah! (1993) * I'll Be There For You (2001) * Yummy (2007) == Other websites == * Official Website (includes lyrics) Category:American pop music groups Category:American R&B; bands Category:Disco groups Category:Funk bands Category:Musical groups from Miami Category:Musical groups established in 1973 Category:1973 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Florida Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1983 Category:1983 disestablishments in the United States Category:20th-century disestablishments in Florida Category:Musical groups established in 1993 Category:1993 establishments in Florida
title: KC and the Sunshine Band
